question: Can I cancel or reschedule my order?
answer: Yes of course! If the day doesn't go as you planned, just let us know before 1pm of your pick up date.

question: Are you open tomorrow?
answer: Most likely yes! Our hours are regularly updated on Google. It will be the best place to get your answer to this question :)

question: Do you do wholesale?
answer: We've learned that running wholesale business requires two things: Next level commitment + a reasonable production capacity. Unfortunately, we have neither and wholesale is not available :(

question: Can I pick up my order before 12pm?
answer: Unfortunately we have removed early pick ups as it was causing too many issues and misunderstandings. Apologies for the disappointment!

question: I missed the order cut off! Can I place an order for same day pick up via email or instagram?
answer: We would love to provide this option but again, it has caused many issues in the past. We will kindly decline all preorder requests sent via messages and email. Sorry!

question: I would like to place a group order for my friends. Can you pack the items separately for each person?
answer: We no longer take request for orders to be split and packed separately. Please place a separate order if you wish to split the order and have them packed separately.

question: I'm placing an order for my friend. Can you write a message for them?
answer: If it's a short one, certainly! We'll get our best hand writer on the job :)

question: How long can I keep the pastries for?
answer: We recommend that all pastry products are consumed on the same day of the purchase. Though there are plenty of tips and tricks on how to refreshen pastries on YouTube and we suggest checking them out.

question: Can I have my pastries packed in a box?
answer: We can pack the pastries in a box for orders with 4 or more items. Just leave us a note during checkout. But please note that we don't have carry bags for our boxes. Yet!

question: Are you hiring?
answer: If you are interested in working with us, please send us your resume to hello@bakemonobakers.com.au
